metadata.title: CVE-2024-6484 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Bootstrap that exposes users toCross-Site Scripting (XSS) attacks. The issue is present in the carouselcomponent, where the data-slide and data-slide-to attributes can beexploited through the href attribute of an <a> tag due to inadequatesanitization. This vulnerability could potentially enable attackers toexecute arbitrary JavaScript within the victim's browser.
